00034 namespace omega

00036 namespace scene

00038         class SceneManager;

00041         class SceneNodeListener
00042         {
00043         public:
00044                 virtual void onVisibleChanged(SceneNode* source, bool value) {}
00045                 virtual void onSelectedChanged(SceneNode* source, bool value) {}
00046         };
00047 
00049         class OUTILS_API SceneNode: public Node
00050         {
00051                 friend class SceneManager; // Needs to call the node draw method.
00052         public:
00053                 enum HitType { HitBoundingSphere };
00054 
00055         public:
00056                 SceneNode(SceneManager* scene):
00057                         myScene(scene),
00058                         myListener(NULL),
00059                         myBoundingBoxColor(1, 1, 1, 1),
00060                         myBoundingBoxVisible(false),
00061                         mySelectable(false),
00062                         myChanged(false),
00063                         myVisible(true),
00064                         mySelected(false)
00065                         {}
00066 
00067                 SceneNode(SceneManager* scene, const String& name):
00068                         Node(name),
00069                         myScene(scene),
00070                         myListener(NULL),
00071                         myBoundingBoxColor(1, 1, 1, 1),
00072                         myBoundingBoxVisible(false),
00073                         mySelectable(false),
00074                         myChanged(false),
00075                         myVisible(true),
00076                         mySelected(false)
00077                         {}
00078 
00079                 SceneManager* getScene();
00080 
00081                 // Drawables
00083                 void addRenderable(Renderable* child);
00084                 int getNumRenderables();
00085                 void clearRenderables();
00087 
00088                 // Options
00090                 bool isSelectable();
00091                 void setSelectable(bool value);
00092                 bool isVisible();
00093                 void setVisible(bool value);
00094                 void setSelected(bool value);
00095                 bool isSelected();
00097 
00098                 // Bounding box handling
00100                 const AlignedBox3& getBoundingBox();
00101                 const Sphere& getBoundingSphere();
00102                 bool isBoundingBoxVisible();

00104                 const Color& getBoundingBoxColor();
00105                 void setBoundingBoxColor(const Color& color);
00107

00110                 void setListener(SceneNodeListener* listener);
00111                 SceneNodeListener* getListener();

00115                 bool hit(const Ray& ray, Vector3f* hitPoint, HitType type);
00116 
00117                 virtual void update(bool updateChildren, bool parentHasChanged);
00118 
00119                 void draw(RenderState* state);
00120 
00121         private:
00122                 void drawBoundingBox();
